replies.body: I always out-juke myself. I go the the right, then run to the left(or visa versa). And either they are really bad and just aim at where I was, or predict the turn around, because I always get hit.
Or you could be like me, and flash into a skillshot that would have missed you.
Like a graceful swan, full of lead.

Have you ever seen a Swan in person. They are overrated creatures.
http://i.imgur.com/QBOVpWC.gif??Noredirect

Okay, let's be honest, if a swan sees any large animal or human messing with its babies, it's going to freak out. That's not douchebaggery. That's necessity. No swan will think "oh this time its just trying to safely dislodge my baby from some trap it got stuck in." It will think by instinct-driven logic, "statistically speaking, 99.9999999% of cases where a larger animal is screwing with smaller animals, it's to eat them."

If that swan DIDN'T attack the man, THEN it'd be a douchebag. I'd think it'd be an ostrich or something the way it cared about babies.

Be nice to animals guys. They don't know what's going on half the time they're around people. They do the best their pee brains can muster.
Pea brains. Like, the saying is that their brains are the size of peas and thus are small, not that somebody tinkled on them. :P

Looked like that guy was going to get goosed by that swan.  That would've been a lark!

*runs like hell before I am maimed for the punnage*

Iv's seen a pelican eat a pigeon before... Now pelicans fucking scare me D: 

The pigeon was on the grass walking around and there was a pelican walking around near the pigeon, they aren't natural predators towards other birds so it made sense that the pigeon wasn't scared or didn't fly away but then the pelican just quickly dashed over and swallowed the poor bird up whole... alive...
Swans are assholes.

child abuse

the mother slap her own baby
I know that one time when I played Irelia top,killed the enemy and I was on low health. I ran into the tower and the enemy Rengo came. He used his Bola and I FLASHED INTO IT GODDAMMIT.

So what you are saying is... that flash gave you E-Bola?

Generally I don't juke, I just happen to be moving in a direction that the skillshot is going. When I do juke it's a flash for an Ez ult that already hit me.

Some people *want* to get hit by Ezreal's ult.
https://linustechtips.com/main/uploads/monthly_2016_02/56b5ace739157_Damnthatsoutrageous_54ed32e26ba7706fb6bb6f47fe7ac39c.gif.2dda248619d3b3bf63656fe6de77f9d7.thumb.gif.12d73e88e40525f2a10cc8818922373f.gif
I'm sure Ezreal loves getting by Taric's Dazzle as well, I mean who doesn't want a face full of Gems. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
She should've dived through it. She'd have made it if she did.
The gif doesn't do the speed justice. I have seen that show, that wall can get moving pretty fast. Also, her leg got caught, preventing her from jumping.

Or...like when they throw a really long skillshot, and your all like "haha I am just gonna run a mile to the left and it won't even come close to hitting me" and you end up running into it. Then you end up looking like an idiot.
https://img.pandawhale.com/post-32233-the-feels-gif-my-emotions-just-wo8f.gif

A few games ago, I was just casually farming mid when I decided to move back to my tower so I could tp without fear of any sudden attacks. Suddenly, an ice arrow flew towards where I had been only two seconds ago. That Ashe never lived it down.

You know what's worse than skillshots? Auto targets. What's even worse than your average auto target its Brands ult. Normally I'll flash away from my teammates to save atleast someone but they think the same thing and flash right at me, while running where I'm running to escape it.
